content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: *Peter Schmidt* Good afternoon, Emilia. I appreciate you considering my apartment for rent. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. I am aiming for the highest possible price, which for a freshly built, unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, I believe should be a substantial amount. Please, make your first offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for the highest possible price, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I have to be mindful of my budget. Would it be possible to start with a lower offer? For instance, could we negotiate a price around 750 Euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: *Peter Schmidt* 750 Euros per month is far below my expectations. I am willing to negotiate, but I assure you, I will not settle for such a low amount. Please, make another offer that is closer to my anticipated price. Remember, this is a highly desirable apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in the middle? How about 850 Euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: *Peter Schmidt* 850 Euros per month is still not satisfactory. I understand your attempt to meet in the middle, but the reality is, my apartment is in high demand. I recommend you reconsider your offer. Remember, this is a newly built, unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, and it is close to all important facilities. I expect a price that reflects its value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Let's continue negotiating. How about 925 Euros per month? This would be a significant increase from my initial offer and reflects the value of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: *Peter Schmidt* 925 Euros per month is still not enough. I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but I must insist that my apartment is worth more. Please, make another offer that reflects the true value of this highly desirable apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I believe we are close to an agreement. How about 975 Euros per month? This is a fair price that takes into account the quality and location of the apartment. I am ready to sign the contract if you find this offer acceptable.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: *Peter Schmidt* 975 Euros per month is closer to my expectations, but it is still not enough. I appreciate your readiness to sign the contract, but I must insist that my apartment is worth more. Please, make another offer that reflects the true value of this highly desirable apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but I believe we have reached the limit of what I can afford. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am concerned that we will not be able to agree on a price that is fair for both parties.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: *Peter Schmidt* I understand your concern, but I am confident that we can find a price that is fair for both parties. If you do not wish to continue the negotiation, I respect your decision. However, I am confident that there are potential tenants who are willing to pay the true value of this highly desirable apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I feel we are not aligned on the value of the apartment. I wish you the best in finding a tenant who can meet your expectations. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
